title: The Democrats WANT Chaos to Happen | 11/23/21 | The Glenn Beck Program
description:
Though the Kyle Rittenhouse trial is over, the media are still lying about it. Pat and Stu go through Kyle Rittenhouse’s interview with Tucker Carlson, where Kyle takes Tucker through the events of the infamous night. Pat and Stu discuss the absurd lengths to which sports have taken COVID protocols. Pat and Stu critique Rashida Tlaib's ignorance of a bill she sponsors. Pat and Stu examine President Biden's performance since being in office and compare his approval rating to previous presidents. Pat and Stu discuss a fringe QANON group waiting for JFK Jr. to appear to reinstate Donald Trump as president. Pat and Stu discuss the updates regarding the suspect in the Waukesha Christmas parade attack, including his lengthy criminal record.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
